name: Brisas Del Mar
address: 99-02 Rockaway Beach Blvd, Rockaway Park, NY 11694, USA

reviews.text: Estas buen la comida pero el Diablo ello si bochonchan tanto de todo que hasta te da un dolor de cabesa ahi comiendoü§£ü§£üòÇüòÇüòÇ

Realmente la comida muy rica, sirven las porciones bastante grandes, solo que la comida estaba fr√≠a no se si es porque fuimos en la tarde pero todo est√° fr√≠o pero a√∫n as√≠ la comida estaba deliciosa
awful food and the staff is rude.
The staff is very friendly, I am happy every time I return.
Not bad , food is common for a dominican restaurant  friendly staff
Very friendly staff and delicious food!
Nice small restaurant
My mom is in a wheelchair and the staff here are kind, accommodating, attentive to her needs.  The food, needless to say, is absolutely delicious.
The food is so good! My favorite place to go over the summer for the beach! ‚ù§Ô∏è they also give ALOT of food which is great.

What an amazing place to grab a quick bite. The food was fresh and delicious, the service was friendly and quick. The set up is buffet style prepared food and you pick and choose what you want to eat. The tables are clean and it was not crowded during lunch hour, as mostly people came in and bought food to go. Highly recommend it, if you‚Äôre looking for some delicious no frills, fresh food!
The only Spanish food in the Rockaway that didnt give me food poisoning. They have the best pork chops Ever!!!!
The food is so good!!!!!
Great place
Muy rico! Muchas gracias por un buen servicio. Comida muy sabrosa

This place came recommended from my AirBNB host.  When I arrived, there was no menu, but an almost cafeteria style layout.  The friendly lady behind the counter explained my options.  I got host over yellow rice and pinto beans with plantains.  It was absolutely fantastic!  And plenty to eat.  There‚Äôs not much seating, and the atmosphere is beach crowd friendly.
Delicious and the portions are bananas for the price. The pernil skin is so crispy, how do they do it??
just is the spot
The food is delicious and the workers are really nice and friendly.
Deliciosa la comida üòã
ery slowly store

Holy deliciousness. Everything taste so pure and flavorful. The staff are so helpful and polite And help you decide when you are so decisive. They also will answer any questions in detail if you have any!! So glad I found this place
Bad service
Best food on the rock
Limited selection but the food is ok. The people are nice too
Chicken cutlet with rice and beans and avacado salad 14$ . Delicious
I hate ordering via Uber eats and Seemless please go back to phone orders.I don‚Äôt want to spend $65 for an order I pay $25 for
I love Brisas. Owners are the best and the food is Primo Spanish food.
Great staff helped get a huge plate of delicious vegan food--beans and rice with avocado salad, regular salad, beet salad, and fried plantains
The absolute best food around.
Real dominican food ,lots of food .potatoes salad,avocado are good  the pastelitos delicioso ,the services was friendly,
Delicious food! The young woman who attended to us was very kind. She packed our servings and chose the best pieces of meat!
Great Spanish food

Batidos are really good. Loved coconut salted fish. Will be back‚ù§Ô∏è

Delicious food
Clean place
Beautiful Servers

We were supposed to eat at another restaurant, Anny, but when we got there, they informed us that they would only accept cash. Yet there was no ATM. We started walking on 116th, looking for an ATM. Instead, we found this place to eat. It's a buffet style place with only one booth style table. The best thing was that the food was good and the price was right.
Hands down delicious food!

Why is when you buy the bake chicken medium plate you only get one piece as for the small I asked the women told me we give more rice. That's crazy if you are buying a medium plate for 17$ it should not be 1 piece of chicken an a lot of rice a bag of rice in the store is how much an what kind of rice are you using to justify you charging 17 dollars if you look at the photos people took you see the medium plate lots of rice one peice of chicken, then you see the small plate rice an the same peice of chicken. You are ripping people off . Well you won't be ripping me off any longer. Open your eyes if you get a salad to go with it they charge you extra a medium plate what only rice an chicken no veg or salad for 17 dollars.
Food was tasty and good portion sizes
First time ordering here. Food tastes good but as one reviewer has said nothing that seriously wowed me. Price is affordable and good portions. Will recommend. üëç

Great staff, food and price. Expect a short line because this place is good. There's a ton of variety here and plenty of options for a vegan like myself. 4 kinds of rice, plenty of salads and many other sides such as meats, beans, and fried plantain. There is definitely something here for you. The perfect place for lunch after the beach

Comida Fresca, sabrosa y latina. Buen precio, buen servicio, y sirven esos plates con ganas jajaja!! Lo recomiendo muchisimo, yo siempre que no hice comida voy para all√° y tienen variedad de comida, tanto, entrada y seco.

This has been my go-to Dominican food place since 2016. I love their empanadas and their roast pork with the skin is just so good. It's hard to know how much everything would cost sometimes but the price is definitely cheap for the amount of food you get. I also always get the green sauce(not sure what it's called but you can eat with the empanadas) It's like creamy horseradish sauce. If you ever go to Rockaway, this is the place you must try!

Have been coming here for years, originally tipped off to it by a local Rockaway resident. The food is unbelievably good. Some favorites are the empanadas, the chicken stew, and the pernil - all of which are pictured. We think it's the best dominican food in the NYC area - closed on Sundays though, which is worth noting.

Dominican at the beach. Yes! Get yourself some dirty rice, mariscos, and healthy scoop of guac. Although I just wanted to keep it to seafood this round, the roast pork and chicken stew both looked good enough I wanted to lick the glass. Glad this spot came up on the google radar. Will be back!

Used to really love this place and they had very affordable pricing but noticed they‚Äôve been charging us way more recently. It depends who serves you. I just looked up the prices online  and we were charged way above what was marked online. Paid $30+ for 2 orders of chicken, rice, & beans large size.
It‚Äôs really bad business to change the prices based on who comes in.
In a world in turmoil you‚Äôd think a local business would want to show some standards or at least be kind. It‚Äôs not right.

Was f√ºr eine Perle von Restaurant! Unglaublich ehrliches und leckeres Essen, riesige Portionen und sehr freundliches Personal. Welch ein Gl√ºck, dass wir das Restaurant bei Google Maps entdeckt haben.
Wirklich ein Geheimtipp und das beste Essen unseres Urlaubs.
first time i ordered from them everything was great, so i decide to order a second time but i found hair in my food, and now i‚Äôm in the bathroom fighting for my life. will not buy from here again.
The food is always great over here and reasonable prices
Comfort foodÔºÅÔºÅ Definitely recommendedÔºÅ Very clean and decent price
Great home style Spanish food. Close to the beach and good servings.
I love this place so much, can you please open on Sunday too? Super delicious, everything is always so fresh, friendly and nice staff. üíô‚Ä¶
Soooooo good ü§§ü§§ü§§ü§§ü§§ fresh nice clean I will go back tomorrow. Perfect üëå‚Ä¶
This restaurant has some tasty food and is the most consistent in the Rockaways!

This is a hidden gem.  I remember a few of years ago going to BBQ up the block on a recommendation and it was awful.  So when we left BBQ we walked past this place and said to my husband we should have gone here  he was like next time.  So we did and never regretted it.  The food is delicious and the portions is very generous üòã. The Monfongo is awesome üëå We love this place.
The food is solid Spanish food. Delicious, consistent, and affordable.
I've been going here for years! The workers treat you like family & are super nice. The food is always fresh & there is always a great selection. No complaints, whatsoever.

My First experience today was amazing, fast delivery, decent prices and the food was soooo good! We got roasted pork shoulder, white rice, stewed beans, fried fish and avocado. It all came out to $16! Big portions too! I‚Äôll definitely be ordering again!

Delicious roast pork with rice and peas.  I wish they would serve food for dine-in on washable dishes rather than serve everything in disposable containers with disposable silverware. Menu items I saw online were not available, such as fish soup or mashed plantains.  I will definitely go there again.

Excellent Service friendly great food always fresh. Very clean establishment would highly recommend this restaurant you won‚Äôt be disappointed. Delicious Spanish food authentic cuisine love this place,the best in the Rockaways.
